name: NORTH CAROLINA INSURANCE UNDERWRITING ASSOCIATION
description: Provides essential property insurance to property owners in the Beach/Coastal areas of NC
sampleDescriptions: Tax treatment of state-based (residential) catastrophe mitigation grants
Support introduction of legislation regarding the federal tax treatment of state-based residential catastrophe mitigation grants (116th Congress - HR 5494, Section 90501 HR 2).
Support introduction of legislation regarding the federal tax treatment of state-based residential catastrophe mitigation grants (HR 3954, Section 7).
Support legislation regarding tax treatment of state-based residential catastrophe mitigation grants (HR 4675, S. 432).
Support legislation regarding tax treatment of state-based residential catastrophe mitigation grants (HR 4675, S. 432, Part 4, Sec. 135401 of HR 5376).
